Tech Mahindra is part of the US $15.4 billion Mahindra Group and is a leading global systems integrator and business transformation consulting organization, focused primarily on the telecommunications industry. Tech Mahindra helps companies innovate and transform by leveraging its unique insights, differentiated services and flexible partnering models. This has helped customers reduce operating costs, generate new revenue streams and gain competitive advantage. Tech Mahindra expanded its IT portfolio in 2009 by acquiring the leading global business and information technology services company, Mahindra Satyam (earlier known as Satyam Computer Services). Tech Mahindra's capabilities spread across a broad spectrum, including Business Support Systems (BSS), Operations Support Systems (OSS), Network Design & Engineering, Next Generation Networks, Mobility Solutions, Security consulting and Testing. Tech Mahindra's solutions portfolio includes Consulting, Application Development & Management, Network Services, Solution Integration, Product Engineering, Infrastructure Managed Services, Remote Infrastructure Management and BSG (comprises BPO, Services and Consulting). With an array of service offerings for TSPs, TEMs and ISVs, Tech Mahindra is a chosen transformation partner for several leading wireline, wireless and broadband operators in Europe, Asia-Pacific and North America. Tech Mahindra has successfully implemented more than 16 Greenfield Operations globally and has over 130 active customer engagements mostly in the Telecom sector. The company has been involved in about 8 transformation programs of incumbent telecom operators. Tech Mahindra has a global footprint through operations in more than 31 countries with 17 sales offices and 15 delivery centers. Assessed at SEI CMMi Level 5, Tech Mahindra's track record for value delivery is supported by over 40,500 professionals who provide a unique blend of culture, domain expertise and in depth technology skill sets. Its development centers are ISO 9001:2008 & BS7799 certified. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

We just help you to get the relevant job Job location: Bangalore Eligibility: Fresher/Experienced Shifts: UK shift Customer service in banking process Customer service is an important, but broad concept in the banking industry. In essence, banks are service-based businesses, so most of their activities involve elements of service. Customer service managers generally deal directly with service issues, but several other common banking jobs involve service. Banking process is a highly specialized sourcing strategy used by banks and lending institutions to support the business acquisition and account servicing activities associated with the customer lending lifecycle. These specific services are usually offered through multi-year service-level agreements of the financial services market. Duties Handle transactions and answer customer queries Decipher customer needs and offer the best solution based on proper company policies Effectively communicate ideas, suggestions and answers Refer customers to people who specialize with the type of problem or query they present Complete complex money-related transactions Offer upgrades and new banking services or products Skills Effective listener and communicator Good problem solving and troubleshooting skills Ability to follow instructions and procedures up to the tiniest detail Keen eye for detail and the drive to serve satisfactorily Career path...Where you can see yourself down the line From being the first point of contact to customers of the bank you can be the key person in operations of the bank in future date. It depends upon you how you put your dedication and passion to seek growth in the industry and also how to explore the existing opportunities in the bank you are working or the industry you are into. Do you have the required skills and wish to make your career in banking sector then apply to this job sending your resume to shwetha.ca@ikyaglobal.com or for quick response call @ 9611209386 and fix up your interview Regards CA Shwetha Recruitment consultant-ITES/BPO IKYA Human capital solutions Bangalore Ikya Human Capital Solutions, A Unit of Quess corp, 2nd floor, Raheja Arcade, Beside Punjab grill, Koramangala, Bangalore Landmark: Opposite to Forum mall, Koramangala Contact details Mob: 9611209386 Email : shwetha.ca@ikyaglobal.com â Salary:INR 3,00,000 - 3,75,000 P.A. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this "Overview Jivox enables the worlds top advertisers and agencies to deliver personalized advertising across all screens. Our flagship product, Jivox IQ, is the leading data-driven dynamic ad platform. Its unique architecture enables customers to develop and serve data-driven dynamic ads in a wide variety of formats, including mobile, interactive, expanding, video, native and much more. Several hundred media companies and agencies today use Jivox for their most demanding creative campaigns, including College Humor, Crispin Porter & Bogusky, Federated Media, Digitas, Havas, Hearst, A&E Networks, Martini Media, Merkley + Partners, Razorfish, TVGla, Universal McCann, Videology and Wieden+Kennedy. Stop by our Ad Gallery at http://www.jivox.com to see our ads at work. Position - Senior AdOps Technical Analyst This position requires an individual with good at Campaign Management - Adops, performance driven, effective communication skills. Also, possesses a good understanding of project/time management skills. Responsibilities This position leads our Global Creative and Design team. The Jivox IQ platform allows our agency and publisher clients to deliver dynamic, rich, multi-screen advertising experiences, and your role will be to ensure that our creative meets the highest quality standards. Core responsibilities include concepting new campaigns in the pre-sales process, executing designs for campaigns in production and ensuring design quality across all aspects of delivery. Youll need a keen eye for fresh and innovative design, as well as strong attention to detail. In this role, youll get to work with some of the most famous US and international brands, as well as top agencies and publishers. Day to day responsibilities include: Managing design quality across all campaigns delivered by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the sales team to concept advertising for major US brands, to be included in sales/marketing pitches. Design ad units for campaigns executed by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the Jivox global design and creative team to define, maintain and monitor quality standards. Assist in building a global design team to provide scalable design support across multiple time zones, geographies and advertising markets. Design and execute animations for design concepts as well as live campaigns. Assist in the design of Jivox Corporation branding, marketing and sales materials, including Jivox.com. Salary: Best in the Industry Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: Design , Creative , User Experience Role Category:Senior Management Role:Creative Director Keyskills Marketing Branding Advertising Sales Campaigns Campaign Management Major Effective Communication Skills Presales Agency Desired Candidate Profile Desired Skills and Experience 8 10 years of design experience in the advertising industry working with major US brands. Experience with multiple advertising formats including interactive pre-roll, rich media and mobile advertising types. Experience managing junior design resources, and working with globally distributed teams. Excellent Photoshop skills. Excellent Flash animation skills. Experience with HTML5/Javascript is a plus. Experience with other rich media platforms is a plus. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent attention to detail and project management skills. BA or BS degree in relevant subject. Working hours CST Hours (1 pm to 10 pm)Location - Bangalore" Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Jivox Software Jivox Software Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Role: Software Engineer, Senior Software Engineer - DevOps About being in Devops: As a Software Engineer in DevOps you will play a pivotal role in defining the infrastructure-as-code & devops practice for Jivox. You will influence and contribute to the automation of Jivoxs software on cloud optimized for handling several billions of ad impressions. You will design and implement large scale public cloud architectures for smoother and faster software delivery. You will design and manage deployments of horizontal scaling systems, monitoring systems, big data systems, and a complete gamut of large scale distributed platform capabilities Jivox is adding to support dozens of billion events. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Advertising / PR / MR / Event Management Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills Software Engineer Senior Software Engineer DevOps Webservices scripting Python Java PHP stack Desired Candidate Profile If this interests you, and you bring to the table the following:At least 2 years experience in working on Amazon Webservices (Amazon SDKs, VPC, AMIs, etc)Excellent programming experience in scripting languages (Python, Ruby or Go preferred)Excellent knowledge of Linux command line tools for server management and tuning (AWK, Daemons and services, NSlookup, Netstat, File descriptors, etc)Excellent knowledge of networking (DNS, NAT, VPN, IPtables, OSPF, etc)Knowledge of Java or PHP stack (Jetty, Tomcat, Servlets, etc) and MySQL queries (mysqldump, mysqlcheck, analyze, etc)Desirable but not mandatory skills:Experience with distributed systemsExperience with configuration management tools like Puppet, Ansible or ChefExperience with CI tools like Jenkins, Teamcity or GoCDKnowledge of open source technologies and tools in devops and cloud like Netflix, etc Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Jivox Software India Jivox is the leader in highly personalized digital advertising and marketing. Jivox delivers the platform that provides a unique facility to create and run personalized advertisement driven by insights. With our unique ability to correlate user and contextual data, the Jivox IQ platform creates personalized digital ads in real time - customized to the individual - by dynamically generating thousands of creative and messaging variations at scale. Jivox platform is built for extreme personalization that analyzes more than 12 billion events every month and crunches multi terabytes of data every day. Jivox helps several enterprises like Microsoft, Sony, BestBuy, WPP, and many more to run successful targeted ad campaigns. Jivox has offices in San Mateo, New York, Bangalore and London. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this The Client Coordinator is responsible to meet Service Delivery, Beyond TAT and Business Targets for the client they are working and ensure that individual as well as team imperatives are met satisfactorily. The Role will include : Briefing the account status to the client as and when required - Tracking the progress of the cases through the progress sheet. Receiving documents & vetting forms, acknowledging receipt of the same to the respective recruiters. Escalation of the same as per Client escalation matrix if the employee is not responding within 3 days of follow up.  Coordinator will be responsible for escalating a case, if not closed with 1 week of submission of documents  Monitor the turn-around-time (TAT) & follow-up to ensure closure within timelines Following up for verifications of ex-employees with the Client post directive for the same. Ensuring continuous adherence to existing guidelines on various aspects of delivery, response to internal clients, mail etiquette. We have an wonderful opportunity with our esteemed client for Senior Engineer / Tech Lead (C#, Restful, SignalR) :: Bangalore. Please find the job description for the position below. Job Description: The Software Test Automation Engineer will be responsible for creating and maintaining the test automation framework, as well as developing tests to validate Connect Homes Platform products. Sound software engineering background and previous test automation experience is necessary. Position Responsibilities Responsibilities will include working with our development teams to ensure top quality web services are designed and developed. The Software Test Automation Engineer would have the following responsibilities: Prepare a right test automation strategy by understanding the features being built and help determine the best course of action to test those features in an automated fashion. Develop new automated tests and maintain existing tests using our existing framework and also extend the framework where necessary. Monitor, debug and fix breakages during the automated runs in our Continuous Integration environment. Create test summary reports and other related documentation. Work with the DevOps teams when issues are found in deployed services and ensure quick feedback on the fix provided by the development team. Review existing test automation solutions to look improvements in quality of tests, identify any gaps and develop solutions to improve the test coverage. Research and stay current on software test automation methodologies and help to define the Test Automation tools & framework roadmap. Collaborate with Development team to create and enhance the continuous integration strategy. Mentor team members on tool use and test automation/performance best practices. Position Qualifications Education: B.E/B.Tech/ M.Tech. - Computer Science. Experience: Minimum 4 to 8 years of experience in software development & test automation. Strong programming knowledge in C#. Expertise in software design patterns and should have participated in design reviews and code reviews. Exposure to Cloud based services like Azure, AWS etc. & different deployment models. Knowledge on Signal R. Good understanding of Web services different types, topologies and technologies. Exposure to all stages of the software lifecycle including requirements gathering, documentation (approach requirements, functional specification, detailed design). Strong knowledge in creating of automation strategies and frameworks. Should have working experience on web services testing & testing the microservices. Creating test suites using frameworks like NUnit & Specflow. o Writing of Stubs & Drivers and test clients. o Understand mocking concepts o Exposure different types of coverage analysis, defect analysis and issue fixing. Working experience on Tools o Jmeter Performance & Load o SOAPUI Functional & Load o nCover Code Coverage Strong knowledge on SQL server 2008 and above. Good exposure to agile methodologies and should have worked in agile teams. Web debugging experience using browser based debugger tools, fiddler, wireshark etc Strong knowledge on configuration management tools like SVN/Git Exposure to service virtualization tools would be an added advantage. Decent understanding of network protocols knowledge will be a plus. Skills and Competencies: Strong engineering competence, including the aptitude to learn new technical concepts quickly. Strong analytical and problem solving skills. Ability to establish rapport and communicate with people at all levels of an organization. Strong verbal and visual presentation skills. Ability to maintain excellent testing documentation and transitional documents. Ability to execute tasks with minimal supervision. Ability to adapt and willingness to learn new technology or techniques If interested or if you have any references please mail the same along with below mentioned details with your updated resume Total years of experience : Relevant years of experience : Current salary : Expected salary : Availability/Notice Period : Current Location : Kind Regards, Preethi Rajendran Recruitment Specialist, PeopleStrong Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills NUnit Azure SQL Server NCover Web Services Testing Fiddler Software Development SOAP UI Design Patterns Automation Testing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization, Computers PG:M.Tech - Any Specialization, Computers Company Profile: PeopleStrong HR Services Pvt. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Designation: DevOps/AWS Cloud Engineer Exp: 3 - 6 Years Location: Bangalore JOB SUMMARY Responsible for working with Digital Harbor System Engineers(SysOps) team to configure, deploy, automate AWS Cloud infrastructure with scalability, fail-over, and security. JOB RESPONSIBILITIES : - The AWS Cloud Administrator/Engineer will join a team of highly skilled professionals in configuration and deployment of our enterprise software into AWS Cloud. - The job requires you to be able to contribute as an engineer by configuring, deploying and troubleshooting complex software applications at the enterprise level. - We are looking for an engineer who is passionate about AWS Cloud technology, passionate about helping customers succeed, passionate about quality and truly enjoys what they do. - The qualified candidate for AWS Cloud Engineer position is someone who has a can-do attitude and is an innovative thinker. - You will also coordinate with development teams, architects, and QA Teams to validate configuration with industry standard best practices before they are placed into production. JOB REQUIREMENTS : - Solid experience with Cloud and virtualization based technologies Amazon Web Services (AWS) - Experience with automation tools (Puppet, Chef) and scripting (Python, Bash, etc.) - Working knowledge with a database system such as MS SQL, Mongo DB. - Experience with configuring databases to support various activities related to the system - Understand database backup and database restoration processes - Migrating experience with existing on-premises application to AWS. - Estimating AWS usage costs and identifying operational cost control mechanisms. - Working knowledge of web application architectures such as JBOSS or Tomcat - Experience with Java, XML, HTML, SSO, SSL, and LDAP is required - Document the environment details, Deployment Diagrams, and network topologies. - Communicate with internal stakeholders to clarify requirements and overcome obstacles to meet the organization goals. - Provide troubleshooting and root cause analysis for production issues. - Demonstrated success as SysOps Engineer/System Administrator in a rapidly changing environment. - A certificate in AWS SysOps Administration would be a plus. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills Java Tomcat XML JBoss HTML Web Services MS SQL Python Web Technologies Bash Desired Candidate Profile DESIRED SKILLS - 3-6 years of related systems engineering experience. - 2-4 years of cloud experience (AWS). - AWS Instance Creation (EC2), Configuration, and Maintenance. - Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) setup and maintenance. - Experience in AWS Security Groups, Routing Tables, Subnets, EBS, Cloud Front, S3, IAM Roles and Policies, Cloud Watch, SNS, SQS, Elastic Load Balancers, SSL Certs, and Auto Scaling Groups. - VPN management using OpenVPN. - Implement Customer Gateways and integrate with AWS cloud. - Disaster Recovery preparedness with multi-zone and/or multi-region options. - Automating AWS tasks using AWS tools, sdks, cloud formation scripts, command line tools. - Backup and Restore management RDS, Mongo DB, and Databases. - Infrastructure and Application monitoring across production and non-production platforms. - Experience with Microsoft Windows Servers and Linux Systems. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this "CA Technologies provides IT management solutions that help customers manage and secure complex IT environments to support agile business services. It's our aim to encourage global collaboration and innovation while supporting and developing our talented workforce. CA Technologies empowers its employees to drive success for both the business and themselves. Job Overview This position is responsible for leading and overseeing the day to day activities of the engineering team of a product or product line. They will also work closely with the strategy and product management teams to envision and define features in the product roadmap and be accountable for the features development, deployment and support. Key Responsibilities Work closely with the strategy and product management teams to envision and define features in the product roadmaprnt Adapt goals for the business line based on changes in CA strategy. Ensure change initiatives are planned and executed in alignment with the desired business outcomes.rnt Direct, plan, control, and evaluate development activities for a product or product linernt Identify and track metrics that can be used to ensure objectives are met and recommend process improvements.rnt Partner with Product Marketing to understand and plan for future product release requirements and to ensure promotion of new features and product value.rnt Work with senior management, product management and marketing to define product direction.rnt Work with product management and marketing to produce roadmap, whitepapers and competitive analysis.rnt Work closely across teams to leverage best practices across multiple product lines and ensure consistency with the Company's software integration standards.rnt Offer significant input into planning of future product releases.rnt Advise on customer education requirements for new products and releases.rnt Maintain communication and public relations with customers and user groups.rnt Provide leadership, maintain visibility and accessibility, build relationships and promote communication with team by conducting regular team meetings and one- on- one sessions, traveling frequently to remote sites, and encouraging an open exchange of ideas and information.rnt Determine and recommend methods to streamline and improve development processes and procedures.rnt Speak externally regarding the Company's technology and product specific topics.rnt Translate product direction into plans to develop and deliver products.rnt Set and meet delivery dates, quality levels and customer satisfaction levels.rnt Determine critical priorities and monitor and control the activities and performance of staff to achieve those objectives.rnt Assign or reallocate duties to personnel to meet various workload pressures and variations where necessary.rnt Ensure staff understands and adheres to corporate policies and procedures.rnt Ensure appropriately qualified and experience personnel are recruited and trained.rnt Communicate frequently with equivalent level managers or senior outside contacts concerning projects, operational decisions, or commitments.rnt Perform resource allocation including budget and personnel. Handle escalations and all higher- level management issues.rnrnrn Typical Role Definition Strategic/ Business/ Operational Leadership. Typically leads a function or multiple 'sub- functions' within the company/ business unit/ brand and most commonly reports to an SVP. Expected to operate autonomously within area of responsibility and fully accountable for meeting strategic financial and operating objectives of the function or 'sub- functions'. Broad knowledge of all aspects within a particular function or 'sub- functions' based on in- depth knowledge experience in middle- management roles. Influences and sets direction for high profile products, processes, services and specific initiatives. Helps establish vision and goals for a specific function or 'sub- functions' that align with overall Company strategy and initiatives. Mobilizes high level technical resources to execute plans around new initiatives/ products. Helps deliver strategic and financial results by growing the business and meeting customer needs - may be involved in planning strategic alliances, capital investments or new product launches. Resolves highly complex problems that require resolution at a senior management level and which often have little or no organizational precedent. Overall control of planning, staffing, budgeting, managing expense priorities, and recommending and implementing changes to methods. Adapts goals based on changes in company strategy. Analyzes and challenges current working methods to create improvements in processes and results. Initiates project related work that impacts functional operations. Determines the necessary infrastructure to support business needs within the function or 'sub- functions'. Helps grow future leaders by giving them accountability and opportunities for growth. Ensures compliance with regulatory requirements for the function or multiple 'sub- functions'. Job- Specific Authority and Scope Generally works without consulting their manager.rnt Independent decisions are made daily.rnt Typically has 6- 10 direct reports.rnt Typically has a total staff of 51- 100.rnt Typically has a global geographic focus.rnt Typically manages a total budget of up to $50 million USD.rnrnrn Business Travel and Physical Demands Business travel of approximately 25 percent yearly is expected for this position. Physical demands: Office environment. No special physical demands required.rnrnrn Preferred Education Master's level degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Sciences Work Experience Typically 12 or more years of experience in software development with leadership and management experience in a medium to large software company with at least 7 years in a leadership role. Skills & Competencies Business Domain Expertise: Masteryrnt Engineering Excellence / Agile: Masteryrnt Requirements Analysis: Masteryrnt Design: Masteryrnt Coding: Masteryrnt Defect Root Cause Identification / Problem Analysis: Masteryrnt Quality Validation: Masteryrnt Configuration Management: Masteryrnt Technical Leadership: Masteryrnt Communication - Written: Masteryrnt Communication - Interpersonal: Masteryrnt Leading Yourself: MasteryrnrnrnLeading the Organization: AdvancedLeading through Others: Mastery If you want to fulfill your potential, be acknowledged for your achievements, and be given autonomy to make decisions for your business and customers; if you want to work with a company that respects you as an individual - recognizing both your needs at work and your responsibilities outside of it - then CA Technologies is where you belong. At CA Technologies your passion and expertise can directly impact the business and you'll help offer our customers practical approaches to delivering new, innovative services and value through IT. Note to Recruiters and Placement Agencies: We do not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward unsolicited agency resumes to our website or to any of our employee. We will not pay fees to any third party agency or firm and will not be responsible for any agency fees associated with unsolicited resumes. Unsolicited resumes received will be considered our property and will be processed accordingly. We just help you to get the relevant job Job location: Bangalore Eligibility: Fresher/Experienced Shifts: UK shift Customer service in banking process Customer service is an important, but broad concept in the banking industry. In essence, banks are service-based businesses, so most of their activities involve elements of service. Customer service managers generally deal directly with service issues, but several other common banking jobs involve service. Banking process is a highly specialized sourcing strategy used by banks and lending institutions to support the business acquisition and account servicing activities associated with the customer lending lifecycle. These specific services are usually offered through multi-year service-level agreements of the financial services market. Duties Handle transactions and answer customer queries Decipher customer needs and offer the best solution based on proper company policies Effectively communicate ideas, suggestions and answers Refer customers to people who specialize with the type of problem or query they present Complete complex money-related transactions Offer upgrades and new banking services or products Skills Effective listener and communicator Good problem solving and troubleshooting skills Ability to follow instructions and procedures up to the tiniest detail Keen eye for detail and the drive to serve satisfactorily Career path...Where you can see yourself down the line From being the first point of contact to customers of the bank you can be the key person in operations of the bank in future date.
